耶和華.definition: Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH); compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]

耶和華見證人.pinyin: Ye1 he2 hua2 Jian4 zheng4 ren2

耶弗他.definition: Jephthah (Hebrew: Yiftach) son of Gilead, Judges 11-foll.

耶律大石.definition: Yollig Taxin or Yelü Dashi (1087-1143), Chinese-educated Khitan leader, founder of Western Liao 西遼|西辽 in Central Asia

耶律楚材.definition: Yelü Chucai (1190-1244), Khitan statesman and advisor to Genghis Khan and Ögödei Khan, known for convincing the Mongols to tax the conquered population of the north China plains rather than slaughter it

耶戶.definition: Jehu (842-815 BC), Israelite king, prominent character in 2 Kings 9:10

耶洗別.definition: Jezebel, wife of Ahab and mother of Ahaziah, major character in 1 Kings 16:31, 19:1, 21 and 2 Kings 9, killed by Jehu 耶戶|耶户[Ye1 hu4]

耶烈萬.definition: Yerevan, capital of Armenia; also written 埃里溫|埃里温[Ai1 li3 wen1]

耶穌升天節.definition: Ascension Day (Christian festival forty days after Easter)

耶穌基督後期聖徒教會.pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Hou4 qi1 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
耶穌基督後期聖徒教會.definition: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

耶穌基督末世聖徒教會.pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Mo4 shi4 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
耶穌基督末世聖徒教會.definition: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

耶穌會士.definition: a Jesuit; member of Society of Jesus

耶穌降臨節.definition: Advent (Christian period of 4 weeks before Christmas)

耶萊娜·揚科維奇.pinyin: Ye2 lai2 nuo2 · Yang2 ke1 wei2 qi2

耶酥.definition: variant of 耶穌|耶稣[Ye1 su1]

耶酥會.definition: the Society of Jesus; the Jesuits
